tool_description: An Api showing all the latest tennis articles around the world.
name: Tennis News
title: Tennis News

api_list.name: Get Individual Tennis news source
api_list.description: Gets articles from an individual tennis news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Tennis News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about Tennis around the world.
